mapper.select: select t1.* from `Real` t1 where id = #{id} and t1.disabled = 0

SELECT sum(zccount) zccount,sum(gzcount) gzcount,sum(yjcount) yjcount,sum(bjcount) bjcount,In_Time from ( SELECT count(*) zccount,0 gzcount,0 yjcount,0 bjcount,date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM history where ErrFlag = 'F' and In_Time > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,count(*) gzcount,0 yjcount,0 bjcount,date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM history where ErrFlag = 'D' and In_Time > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,0 gzcount,count(*) yjcount,0 bjcount,date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM history where ErrFlag = 'T' and (ErrThunder = '01' or ErrTemp = '01' or ErrLeihua = '01' or ErrLC1 = '01' or ErrLC2 = '01' or ErrLC2 = '01') and In_Time > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,0 gzcount,0 yjcount,count(*) bjcount,date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM history where ErrFlag = 'T' and (ErrThunder = '10' or ErrTemp = '10' or ErrLeihua = '10' or ErrLC1 = '10' or ErrLC2 = '10' or ErrLC2 = '10') and In_Time > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(In_Time,'%Y-%m-%d'))a GROUP BY In_Time

SELECT sum(zccount) zccount,sum(gzcount) gzcount,sum(yjcount) yjcount,sum(bjcount) bjcount,sum(TTime) TTime, In_Time from ( SELECT count(*) zccount,0 gzcount,0 yjcount,0 bjcount,0 TTime,date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM real_his where ErrFlag = 'F' and createTime > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,count(*) gzcount,0 yjcount,0 bjcount,0 TTime,date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM real_his where ErrFlag = 'D' and createTime > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,0 gzcount,count(*) yjcount,0 bjcount,0 TTime,date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM real_his where ErrFlag = 'T' and (ErrThunder = '01' or ErrTemp = '01' or ErrLeihua = '01' or ErrLC1 = '01' or ErrLC2 = '01' or ErrLC2 = '01') and createTime > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') union all SELECT 0 zccount,0 gzcount,0 yjcount,count(*) bjcount,0 TTime,date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') In_Time FROM real_his where ErrFlag = 'T' and (ErrThunder = '10' or ErrTemp = '10' or ErrLeihua = '10' or ErrLC1 = '10' or ErrLC2 = '10' or ErrLC2 = '10' or Switch1 ='1' or Switch2 ='1' or Switch3 ='1' or Switch4 ='1') and createTime > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')
union all
SELECT 0 zccount, 0 gzcount, 0 yjcount, 0 bjcount, sum(TTime) TTime, date_format( createTime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) In_Time FROM real_his where createTime > #{near7Day} GROUP BY date_format( createTime, '%Y-%m-%d' )
)a GROUP BY In_Time
